rooms.description: Small foyer leading into the main areas. Designed to be welcoming and provide a transitional space.
Open-plan living area that merges with the kitchen for Mediterranean aesthetics. Large windows and sliding glass doors ensure ample natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles.
Integrates within the open-plan living area to facilitate family gatherings; features a central dining table and seating arrangement.
Open-plan kitchen with Mediterranean style finishes. Includes modern appliances, natural stone countertops, and ventilation that promotes air circulation in accordance to Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with south-facing window for optimal light; includes a walk-in closet. Aligned with Vastu for north or east orientation for prosperity and calm.
Balanced bedroom designed with sufficient natural lighting and ventilation, positioned as per Vastu guidelines to ensure positive energy flow.
Sufficiently sized bedroom maintaining natural light access; includes built-in storage solutions in accordance with space optimization and local architectural norms.
Additional bedroom optimized for ventilation, natural lighting and privacy. Designed to maintain balance as per Vastu principles.
Full bathroom with water element; designed in compliance with local building norms, ensuring proper drainage and ventilation aligned with Vastu.

openings.description: Mediterranean styled main entrance door positioned to the south for auspicious energy entry, as per Vastu guidelines.
Large windows in the living area, designed to maximize natural light and ensure cross ventilation; oriented east-west for optimal morning and evening light.
Strategically placed kitchen windows for natural light, ensuring a balanced airflow in the cooking area in alignment with Vastu principles.
Staircase leading to a rooftop terrace that provides additional living space and natural ventilation. The staircase is integrated into the open-plan design, ensuring seamless flow.

roof Terrace.description: A small rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and enjoying natural light. It includes seating arrangements, a pergola, and outdoor lighting in line with Mediterranean aesthetics.

levels.notes: The design adheres to local building norms while integrating Vastu principles such as proper room orientation (e.g., main entrance in the south, master bedroom ideally oriented east or north) and ensuring natural light and ventilation. The open-plan layout encourages a sense of spaciousness and community, with Mediterranean influences visible in finishes, materials, and overall aesthetics.
